description: Over 30 covers graced the 7 issues of the hit comic book title RETURN TO WONDERLAND. Now you can collect all of them in one complete cover gallery! Artists such as Eric Basaldua, Bill Tucci, Talent Caldwell, Al Rio, Stjepan Sejic and many more show off their gorgeous work that helped make RETURN TO WONDERLAND one of the best comics of 2007!

volume.name: Grimm Fairy Tales: Return To Wonderland Cover Gallery
Powerpuff Girls The Movie: The Comic

description: It's here! Because you demanded it! The most popular super-heroines under the age of ten star in their very own ongoing series, and they're going to pound all the evildoers into paste! Bubbles uses Chemical X to bring an injured squirrel back to health. Will the girls have a new sidekick, or will they be..."By Twitchy Betrayed"? With future issues including appearances by popular PG villains including Him, Mojo Jojo and the Amoeba Boys, fighting evil has never been cuter!
name: Squirrelly Burly

description: Buttercup's got...a boyfriend??? Can it be? But when she rejects his love, Him steps in, and dreams up an incredible scheme to steal all the love from Townsville. Baby, where did our love go?
name: Buttercup's Boyfriend

description: A mysterious meteor lands in Townsville! Suddenly, everyone--from the Mayor to Professor Utonium--has super-powers, and they all think they know how to fight villains and save the world. Are the Powerpuff Girls obsolete?
name: Power Play

description: The Girls go wild for a videogame sent by an anonymous fan--but don't realize that their every push of the button is causing real-life, giant-sized havoc! Is it "Game Over" for Townsville?
name: Video Maim

description: Bubbles loses a baby tooth, and can't wait to swap it for a quarter from the Tooth Fairy. But guess who'll stop at nothing to get it from her first? Go on, guess!
name: Holy Molar!

description: Mojo Jojo tries to order a pizza and hits the jackpot instead--when he dials the Powerpuff hotline by mistake! Now the Girls are taking marching orders from their worst enemy in "Dial M for Mojo"!
name: Dial M For Mojo

description: Someone's shaking Townsville down for all its paper money, but the Girls have problems of their own: They can't tear Bubbles away from the boob tube to fight crime! Find out the connection in "Remote Controlled!"
name: Remote Controlled

description: Ms. Bellum's on vacation, so the Mayor's in charge of Townsville — and we all know that's bad news! The Girls cope with City Hall craziness in "Mayor, May I."
name: Mayor, May I?

description: What evil lurks in the waters off Townsville--and however will the Girls stop it when it slithers onto dry land? Plus, Bubbles' love for gum gets her in a sticky situation.
name: Creature At Large!; Blowing Bubbles

description: It's a birthday party! Everybody loves birthday parties! And this one has a clown! Everyone loves clowns!! Uh oh! This clown is going bonkers! Looks like it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to shut him down before the joke's on Townsville.
name: Rogue Clowns

description: A blizzard closes Pokey Oaks Kindergarten, and the Girls get a day off--but they're too snowed under with crimefighting to have fun. It'll take an Abominable Snowman to chill them out.
name: Snow Day

description: "Who said that?" "What's crawling down my neck?" "Everyone's watching me!" The Girls are all paralyzed by a peculiar paranoia! Plus, the Gangreen Gang's first POWERPUFF comics appearance!
name: Paranoid Puffs

description: D-uh, it's the Amoeba Boys' first appearance in THE POWERPUFF GIRLS, boss! When Townsville's lamest villains decide to become Townsville's lousiest superheroes, the Girls rush to stop the Boys in their slimy tracks! Yuck!
name: Going Squiggly

description: Sedusa's back, and she's got the Girls tied up in knots! Plus, the Girls rush to stop the Gangreen Gang from vandalizing Townsville to the ground with super-destructive spraypaint!
name: Hell Toupee; Five Green Vandals

description:
The day is saved, but all is lost! After messing up a smackdown with the mighty "Cater-Pillager," Bubbles runs away! When the monster makes a comeback, it looks like Townsville's on the ropes for sure!

Homage cover: to X-Men #138- sisters and villain in left background, Bubbles exiting to right foreground with hobo pack slung over her shoulder.
name: The Trouble With Bubbles

description: Sugar, spice...and a little kung fu! That dastardly monkey Mojo Dojo uses some Eastern wisdom to pound the Girls silly; plus, Buttercup learns a bit about Zen in order to...calm down??
name: Now and Zen; Mojo Dojo

description: If a tree falls in the forest and nobody sees it, did it fall at all? If you scream in space, can anyone hear you? And if Blossom loses her pretty red bow...is she really the leader of the Powerpuff Girls?
name: Bow Jest

description: Something's fishy around here...and it's destroying Townsville! When Professor Utonium tells a little white lie, Him turns it into a big red monster--and every fib the Powerpuff Girls tell just makes it bigger!
name: Big Fish Story

description: The Girls teach Fuzzy Lumpkins some manners--literally! Plus, Buttercup punches out the Mayor!
name: My Fair Fuzzy; Brat Worst

description: Lonely Mojo Jojo builds himself a monster bride for Valentine's Day! Will the Girls have the heart to stop him...and her?
name: The Bride of Mojo Jojo

description: Special 25th issue celebration! The fan-favorite POWERPUFF GIRLS team of Moore, Carolan and Moy brings you a far-out tale wherein the evil Boogie Man tries once again to take over Townsville! Blame it on the Boogie!
name: Lite Frite

description: Go scouting with the Powerpuff Girls in this action-packed, camping-and-cookie-peddling issue. But watch out for two of the Girls' nastiest foes!
name: Scout Coup

description: When the Professor grounds the Girls for an incredibly messy room, even Powerpuff power can't keep it clean. It's almost like magic--evil HIM magic!
name: Bless This Mess

description: It’s a day in the life of the Girls’ nemesis, Princess, as they repeatedly foil her attempts to be the boss of everything! Plus, a researcher who wants to study the habits of the North American Super-Hero makes crimefighting impossible for the Girls!
name: Princess For A Day; Mild Kingdom

description: Tuckered-out Townsville wants to take a holiday--but HIM’s the center of the big celebration! Plus, who’s afraid of the Closet Monster? Definitely not Buttercup--that is, until the Closet Monster actually shows up!
name: Helliday; Who's Afraid of the Monster In the Closet

description: Bubbles causes troubles in Townsville! First, she gets a chain letter that spells pure mayhem for anyone who doesn’t answer it! Then, she agrees to help Mojo with a project to earn some spare change. But is this project really just a home for “adorable baby animals, cute little puppies, cuddly tiny kittens, and precious petite possums?” Well, duh.
name: Chain of Fools; Monkey See, Monkey Dough

description: Sugar, spice, and...shaving cream? The Gangreen Gang frames the Powerpuff Girls for a bunch of nasty Halloween pranks in “Trick or Beatings”!
name: Trick Or Beatings

description: Are they really ready--for this jelly? As the Girls nab a burglar in the Professor’s lab, a little bit of Chemical X makes a very big jelly-jar monster!
name: Jelly Jam

description: Special Mojo Jojo spotlight issue! Mojo gets stuck between a rock and a fuzzy place in “Like It or Lumpkins.” And then the monkey clones his big-brained self in “Eenie Meanie Mini Mojo”!
name: Like It Or Lumpkins; Eenie Meanie Mini Mojo

description: A supervillain is spelling out her plans letter-by-letter, and since spelling’s not their strong suit, that spells T-R-U-B-B-L-E for the Girls in "Spellbound"! Plus, in "Tragic Marker," Mojo Jojo develops a marker that changes the atomic structure of any item when the lettering on its label is rearranged.
name: Spellbound; The Tragic Marker

description: Bubbles brings a froggy friend home from a field trip and makes a frog-hunting villain hoppin' mad in "It's Sleazy Being Green."
name: It's Sleazy Being Green

description: Spring has sprung, so the evil HIM turns Townsville into a battleground of gigantic blossoms! Plus, Sedusa ruins an innocent game of dress-up with hypnotic make-up, and it's up to lipstick-loathing Buttercup to save the day!
name: Beauty Is Him Deep; Powerful Pretty

description: Rock and roll with the Powerpuff Girls! Sugar, spice, and a butt-kicking back-beat save the day in two rockin' stories!
name: Rock, Girls, Rock; Slayhem Mayhem

description: The Girls' favorite cartoon heroine, Tess Turbine, comes to town...but so does trouble, when the Girls decide to let their superstar visitor try to save the day!
name: To Be Or Not TV

description: The City of Townsville is shivering in the summertime, thanks to the weather-warping villainy of Mojo Jojo! Plus, Blossom and Buttercup face off in a super-powered staring contest.
name: No Business Like Snow Business; Stared Straight
Everything You Know About The Powerpuff Girls Is Wrong!

description: Townsville heats up when Buttercup eats garlic pizza, and we ain't talkin' pepperoni! Plus, the Girls battle a mind-absorbing monster!
name: Pizza My Heart; Absolutely Absorbing
The Eyes Have It!; Knit One, Purl Doom
Snack Sneak; Moon Over My Townsville
See You Later, Narrator!; Sock It To Me

description:
1) Princess Morbucks traps Ms Keane and Powerpuff girls making her the ruler of the school, making the students have endless recess.

2) Fuzzy Lumpkins sneeze infects the city, making everyone fuzzy and be like him
name: Endless Recess!

description: A fishing trip leads to a fish-monster rampage, but will Bubbles side with her sisters or the bad guy? Plus, the comics debut of Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, the new show from Powerpuff Girls creator Craig McCracken, coming from Cartoon Network!
name: Fish Fight

description: Powerpuff Girls fight against the Blue Bookman. an ex-super hero who want file the entire city in alphabetical order.
Princess gets persnickety when Bubbles wows Townsville with her gardening. It looks like there won't be peas in our time as Princess experiments with new ways to cause trouble!

Meet the Micros! Mysterious miniature versions of the Girls have come to Townsville. Will they be the Powerpuffs' new best friends, or do they have something more sinister in mind? Plus, Sedusa's look is all the rage? What's in this season is evil!
A giant sea-monster calls for dancing...nonstop rain dancing, that is! Will the Powerpuffs Girls be beat by their own dancing feet? Plus, Princess takes her homework assignment a little too far!
Jojo is cooking up trouble! Or so the Powerpuff Girls believe after the plotting primate opens his own restaurant! Plus, you can help the Powerpuffs save a costume party from Gangreen Gang disaster!

They're baaaaaaaaaack! Those mischievous little duplicates of the Powerpuffs have returned with a new scheme for havoc. Will the girls figure it out before the Micros cause macro confusion? Plus, you too can draw the Powerpuff Girls!
name: Micro Managing

description: The Girls are challenged to a contest of cosmic consequences: monster tiddlywinks!

A special reprinting of the hard-to-find first issue of THE POWERPUFF GIRLS! Your collection isn't complete without "Squirrelly Burly," the classic tale of a super-powered squirrel that was made into the episode "Stray Bullet"!
Say "cheese!" And say goodbye to Townsville, citizens. The entire picture-perfect city becomes captured on film, literally, by a crazy camera-happy villain. Are the Girls photo-finished this time?
name: Shutterthug

description: Surf's up! The only thing that'll get Buttercup into the water at Townsville Beach is a bunch of increasingly deadly dares by arch-rival Princess! Plus, Bubbles becomes a famous artist, but Mojo Jojo's out to color her blue!
name: Shore Thing!; Powerpuff Picasso

description: Professor Utonium tries to read his Girls a bedtime story. But Blossom, Buttercup and Bubbles all want to make this fairy tale into a fearsome one. Red Riding Hood will never be the same after getting the Powerpuff treatment!
name: Bedcrime Story

description: The Amoeba Boys set up such a lame gambling business that nobody can lose at it--nobody, that is, until the Mayor bets the city! It's up to the Girls to beat the Boys at their own game!
name: Amoeba Las Vegas

description: Powerpuff girls go to a world which the villain and heroes are reverse. They must must mirror version of themselves the Power Punk girls.
name: Déjà View
Haath aur Hathiyaar
MrityuData
Kayar

description: Rakan is a lonely orphaned teen with an unusual attraction to flowers and plants. Chigusa is his surprise guest, who arrives mysteriously one day out of nowhere. Together, these two uncover secrets about each other--including the fact that Rakan may be a special prince who Chigusa insists on protecting at all costs! From master storyteller Shiho Sugiura, comes a unique tale of adventure and emotion as two unlikely friends try to get used to new surroundings...and to each other.
name: Silver Seed

description: Rakan's normal life has been turned upside down thanks to strangers from another world suddenly appearing in his backyard! Chigusa and Narushige are starting to become more comfortable with their new surroundings, but coming to disrupt the peace is an assassin sent by the Prince. Will Chigusa save the day again?
name: Master & Servant

description: After capturing the assassin Tohji, Rakan and his two guests return to squabbling over what to eat for dinner. As they interrogate Tohji, they come to realize that he may not be so different from themselves. Meanwhile, Chigusa begins to realize that his growing affection for Rakan is starting to overcome his desire to drag Rakan back to the other world to use as his tool. But what does Rakan want? And what will happen when the dark prince who shares Rakan's face suddenly shows up in this world?!
name: Switch All On

description: Rakan makes the bold decision to return to the other world with Chigusa and the others. Awaiting them is a place without light, a place where the forests have disappeared. This is a world that is beginning its end. But for the people who have no one to turn to in this dying world, Rakan has arrived to be their savior. A legend is about to be born...
name: Granting Purpose
Ties That Bind

description: The Imperial Prince releases a new prophecy...that the world is coming to an end and all will suffer many trials along the way. But is any of it true? Or is it the Imperial Prince himself who is turning it into truth? And in this new ocean of unrest, Rakan is beginning to turn the tide...
name: Prophecy Fulfilled

description:
Reprints the following stories.

Battlestar Galactica #7 - All Things Past And Present

Battlestar Galactica #8 - Shuttle-Diplomacy

Micronauts #11 - We are the Enigma Force

Barely having escaped with his life, Cole must make his way back to the front lines of the Civil War to deal some justice of his own. With his son in tow, and an assassin hot on his tail, Cole will have to face the wilds of the West and horrors of War if he wants to keep what remains of his family whole. The penultimate issue of the critically acclaimed series from the writer of the best-selling 28 Days Later.

The amazing finale of The Deadpool Corps' premiere mission! What lies at the heart of the cosmic consciousness? How will Deadpool and company defeat this sinister thing which menaces the multiverse? Will the good ship Bea Arthur weather the cosmic Mind Storm? It's do or die!
